roleset.name: (cause to) not be able to breathe
roleset.note: ASPHYXIATE-V NOTES: Frame created by Arrick (from asphyxiate.01-v)
ASPHYXIATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, asphyxiate.01. Corresponds to VNcls poison-42.2, suffocate-40.7. (from asphyxiation.01-n)

roles.note: arg3 added due to noun-particular usage (differing from verb frame). (from asphyxiation.01-n)

role.descr: instrument, if cause also present as arg0

example.name: arg 1 only
example.text: She-1 had been sexually abused *-1 and asphyxiated *-1

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: "Alford referred to his asphyxiation of Ms. Wortman as 'foreplay,'" the complaint states.

example.name: arg1 and 3
example.text: All his melancholy, his misanthropy, his acidity of temperament, his rancor of soul, his asphyxiation of the spirit, were due to a simple error of refraction, that might have been adjusted by an itinerant optician.
